lines.content: > ‚ÄúYour mind is for having ideas, not holding them.‚Äù ‚Äì David Allen ([source](https://www.zen-tools.net/getting-things-done.html))
KieTwoForOne frees your mind from having to remember things you need to do. It's,
All you need to do is,
4. let it manage your tasks for you üòâ
If you are a Java programmer, you can also use it to practice Java. Here's the `main` method:
